meta.institutions-description: Discover top universities all over Europe and find the perfect match for your studies.

meta.profile-description: Find all information, analyses, and contact details on {{institution}} in {{country}}.

meta.screenshots-description: See screenshots of {{institution}} to learn more about the institution.
meta.subject-description: Find out more about {{subject}} offered by {{institution}}.

online-marketing.header-text: We analysed the website of {{name}} based on Google Lighthouse.

categories.performance-text: In this category we analyse how quickly the website loads and how quickly users can access or view content.
categories.seo-text: Various tests to determine how well the website can be crawled by search engines and displayed in search results.
categories.bestpractices-text: The 16 best practices tested focus mainly on website security and modern web development standards.
categories.accessibility-text: These audits assess how well the website can be used by people with disabilities using screen readers.
categories.pwa-text: Progressive Web Apps use modern web capabilities to deliver an app-like user experience.
